roleset.name: update, improve

example.name: purpose should be arg?
example.text: We know Verdi 's own contribution was mighty impressive since the operatic `` Libera me '' was reworked for the Manzoni Requiem , of which he wrote every note himself having learned his lesson .

propbank.arg: for the Manzoni Requiem , of which he wrote every note himself having learned his lesson

roleset.note: REWORK-V NOTES: Frames file for 'rework' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry. (from rework.01-v predicate notes)
